short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time on Craigslist by peeking into listings and images without a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New v3.2! See why over 35000 people love the NUMBER 1 craigslist app in the store!

Mouse over Craigslist listings to view them instantly without leaving the search results.

Download now and save hours of time -- works for all craigslist sections -- simple, clean, & fast.

TIP: Works best in List or Thumb view

Features.
------------
-view all images and text 
-works on all popular craigslist locations and categories
-maximize your time on craigslist
-safe & secure - no unnecessary permissions 
-constantly updated & maintained
-Free!

Please email bugs to: me@craigslistextension.com BEFORE leaving bad reviews

-- Update -- 12/7/16 -- 3.21 -- CL changed their code again - fixed!

-- Update -- 11/4/16 -- 3.20 -- Updated to work with new CL. Nicer formatting of rows

-- Update -- 1/12/16 -- 2.99 -- Updated to work with new CL. Less annoying share links

-- Update -- 6/24/15 -- 2.97 -- Fixed bugs for new update. Better mouse detection

--Update -- 9/8/14 -- 2.96 -- FINALLY FIXED - NOW WORKS WHEN YOU'RE LOGGED IN!

--Update -- 7/24/14 -- 2.95 -- Updated to work with new code

--Update -- 4/24/14 -- 2.92 -- Minor bug fixes

-- Update -- 3/7/14 -- 2.91 -- Updated to work with newest craigslist(fixed img bug)

-- Update  -- 11/08/2013 -- 2.90 -- FASTER + More efficient loading. Updated to work with new CL code.

-- Update  -- 10/30/2013 -- 2.88 -- Fixed Images, +Bug fixes!

-- Update -- 6/28/2013 -- 2.87 -- Fixed imgs! Temporarily removed ads.

-- Update 5/6/2013 -- 2.85 -- Improved speed, minor bug fixes!

-- Update 3/21/2013 -- 2.81 -- Fixed a bug with format display.

-- Update 1/30/13 -- 2.74 -- Fixed a bug where installer wasn't working properly. Design tweaks!

-- Update 1/26/2013 -- 2.71 -- HUGE UPDATE! Completely rewritten, FASTEST VERSION EVER. Works with all the newest craigslist updates! + Nav menu works again!

-- Update 1/18/2013 -- 2.64 -- Updated to work with the newly redesigned Craigslist! Many changes! Old CL listing format support will be phased out

-- Update 1/13/2013 -- 2.60 -- Added ability to share with your friends!

-- Update 11/29/2012 -- 2.58 -- FIXED! Updated to work on latest Craigs list changes.

-- Update 11/8/2012 -- 2.55 -- Performance improvements + Updated formatting in some sections + Stability fix!

-- Update 10/1/2012 -- 2.51 -- Best version yet! Image mouseover bug is now fixed + Added the Title, Date, and Reply email link in the preview as well! + Performance improvements!

-- Update 8/24/2012 -- 2.42 -- Fixed a bug with the new "Reply To" email button! Update 64px imgs

-- Update 8/13/2012 -- 2.40 -- Faster than ever! Speed improvements, fixed images problem on some systems.

-- Update 7/14/2012 -- 2.30 -- Fixed a display bug on some systems, UI tweaks, more beautiful fonts!

 -- Update 7/1/2012 -- 2.21 -- Larger images and previews! Faster rendering! Fixed "Reply To" link!

 -- Update 4/12/2012 -- 2.1 -- Fixed image mouseover! Added contact seller email link at the bottom. Now you can do everything without ever clicking on a listing!

 -- Update 2/17/2012 -- 2.0 -- Complete redesign and performance improvements! Now much more BEAUTIFUL and easier to read

 -- Update 2/13/2012 -- We are now International! Craigslist pop now works for the following countries: US, Canada, Mexico, UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, India, and the Philippines!

 -- Update 12/20/2011 -- Performance & bug fixes!

craigslist pop. -- View Craigslist ads, listings, posts, and images without a single click! - the FASTEST way to browse Craigslist!


Privacy.
-----------
-craigslist pop. only has access to craigslist.org & amazon.com.
-nothing is stored locally
-no personal data is accessed at any time
-Free!

This version is currently offered as FREE. To support my development and maintenance time, it also serves amazon ads - all proceeds will be used solely to pay my college tuition. No other data is accessed. The extension is un-installable if you do not wish to contribute.

If you feel that craigslist pop has helped your life, please leave a positive review!

craigslist pop. is constantly updated and improved. If you find a bug, please email me at me@craigslistextension.com  - and I will do my best to make changes.

If you love it, be sure to tell your friends!
